title: Honey Potts And Her Alien Mates
description: Honey Potts is a young vibrant green eyed black haired female who has recently lost her parents to an intoxicated driver. She enjoys her usual weekly night out on the town with her best friend Rhiannon Lyons. Once the night is over she heads home and is surprised to find three bright lights floating around in her bedroom. Honey is not frightened of the lights and in fact laughs and plays with them as they dance around her room.Honey doesn't realize she is actually playing with three large handsome aliens from the planet Calt and that they have come to claim her.She is convinced to join with the three handsome aliens, Sven, Cail and Igor Malay but once the joining is complete, Honey withdraws into herself and becomes sad and depressed.Can her mate's convince her that they love her or will they lose her and have to take her back to planet Earth as they promised to?
author: Becky Wilde
